New Records: Dalton Knecht and Anthony Davis both scored 35 points in the game
Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht drilled a three-pointer over Bol Bol with 4.8 seconds remaining to tie the score at 113-113
Knecht took over in the overtime period to ice the game for Los Angeles, hitting a handful of three-pointers and converting a late and-one attempt to seal a victory
Pre-Game Insights: Suns coach Mike Budenholzer confirmed Jusuf Nurkic would make his lone preseason appearance while Grayson Allen would miss the finale
Budenholzer was asked prior to the game how important the last four games have been during his early tenure as head coach
Post-Match Reflections: Knecht and Davis finished with a respective 35 points each
Booker led the Suns in scoring at 22 though Durant (19) wasn't far behind
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers carried a 35-30 lead into the second quarter after a strong effort from three-point land that saw eight of fifteen shots connect
Anthony Davis led all scorers with 15 points to pair with five rebounds after the opening 12 minutes
Others: The Suns will begin their regular season on Oct. 23 against the Los Angeles Clippers
